p: We conducted a cross-sectional survey using RDS sampling methodology in the two urban cities of Maputo and Nampula/Nacala, located in the South and North regions of Mozambique, respectively. This survey methodology has been widely used among hard-to-reach populations to estimate HIV prevalence and associated risk factors, and also to evaluate access and use of health services [ 6, 7, 20â€“ 25]. Recruitment occurred between September 2013 and March 2014. The recruitment procedures have been published previously [ 6, 7].
